text: Horace Harvey was a South African international lawn bowler. ==Bowls career== In 1938 he won the gold medal in the singles event at the 1938 British Empire Games. He was a 1937 singles National Champion bowling for the Brakpan Bowls Club, Guateng. ==Personal life== His father was Andrew Harvey who competed in the 1934 British Empire Games and his son was Tommy Harvey, a winner of two medals at the 1972 World Outdoor Bowls Championship. ==References== Category:South African male bowls players Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for South Africa Category:Bowls players at the 1938 British Empire Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls
title: Horace Harvey (bowls)
